text: RASU or Rasu may refer to: * Joshua Rasu, a Vanuatuan cricketer * Monte Rasu, a mountain in Sardinia, Italy * Perumal Rasu, an Indian poet * Rangoon Arts and Sciences University, former name of University of Yangon, Myanmar * Rasu Jilani * Rasu Kami, a village in the Indian state of Tripura * Rasu Madhuravan, a Tamil film director
title: RASU
